ðŸ“– Summary: The MediaInfo repository provides a command-line interface (CLI) and graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for displaying technical and tag data extracted from video and audio files. It supports various operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and Apple's operating systems, and offers different GUI options based on the platform.
